test.test-assertion: cascade-delete not supported for many-many relationships test
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] Test do not apply to non entity EJB

test.test-assertion: EJB bean class properly declares all container managed fields as non-transient fields test.
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] class com.sun.enterprise.tools.verifier.tests.ejb.entity.cmp.CmpFieldsTransient expected Entity bean, but called with Session.

test.test-assertion: EJB 2.0 Spec 9.4.1, the cmp and cmr fields should be virtual fields only
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] Test do not apply to non entity EJB

test.test-assertion: Each entity Bean may have zero or more non-static ejbPostCreate methods test
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] class com.sun.enterprise.tools.verifier.tests.ejb.entity.ejbpostcreatemethod.EjbPostCreateMethodStatic expected Entity bean, but called with Session bean.

test.test-assertion: EJB 2.0 Spec 9.7.4 Dependent value class must be declared public and not abstract
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] Test do not apply to non entity EJB

test.test-assertion: EJB 2.0 Spec Chapter 10 Container managed persistent queries should comply with specification in its sytax and semantic rules
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] Not applicable: Test only applies to container managed EJBs

test.test-assertion: Container managed fields must have at least one element defined for container-managed persistence test.
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] class com.sun.enterprise.tools.verifier.tests.ejb.entity.cmp.CmpFieldsDefinedForContainerPersistence expected Entity bean, but called with Session bean.

test.test-assertion: Security roles used in method permission element must be defined in the roles element of the deployment descriptor test
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] There are no [method-permission] elements within this bean [ TestBean ]

test.test-assertion: Primary key field declared in the persistence fields test.
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] class com.sun.enterprise.tools.verifier.tests.ejb.entity.pksinglefield.PrimekeyFieldPersistentFields expected Entity bean, but called with Session bean.

test.test-assertion: EJB 2.0 Spec 9.7.11 ejbHome[METHOD] methods must be public and not static
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] Home interface [ com.sun.cts.tests.appclient.deploy.compat.TestBeanHome ] does not define any ejbHome[METHOD] methods

test.test-assertion: Primary Key Field test
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] class com.sun.enterprise.tools.verifier.tests.ejb.entity.PrimaryField expected Entity bean, but called with Session bean.

test.test-assertion: Ejb primary key class properly declares public class modifier test
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] class com.sun.enterprise.tools.verifier.tests.ejb.entity.pkmultiplefield.PrimaryKeyClassModifier expected Entity bean, but called with Session.

test.test-assertion: ejbFind[METHOD] methods which properly do not throw java.rmi.RemoteException test
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] class com.sun.enterprise.tools.verifier.tests.ejb.entity.ejbfindermethod.EjbFinderMethodException expected Entity bean, but called with Session bean.

test.test-assertion: Entity home interface create methods must return remote interface test
test.test-description: For [ TestBean ] class com.sun.enterprise.tools.verifier.tests.ejb.entity.createmethod.HomeInterfaceCreateMethodReturn expected Entity bean, but called with Session bean.

test.test-assertion: The AppClient deployment descriptor has the expected PubidLiteral "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD J2EE Application Client 1.2//EN".
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] The deployment descriptor has the proper PubidLiteral: -//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD J2EE Application Client 1.2//EN For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] The deployment descriptor has the proper URL corresponding the the PubIdLiteral: http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/application-client_1_2.dtd

test.test-assertion: Application client enterprise bean reference type test
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] All ejb-ref-type elements are valid. They are all [ Entity ] or [ Session ] within this application client [ appclient_dep_compat_client ]

test.test-assertion: Application client enterprise bean link element test
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] ejb-link [ TestBean ] found same value as EJB [ TestBean ]

test.test-assertion: Application client enterprise bean link element test
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] ejb-link [ TestBean ] found only one corresponding EJB value [ TestBean ] for application client [ appclient_dep_compat_client ]

test.test-assertion: Application client references to other beans homes test
Application client EJB reference name is prefixed with recommended string "ejb/" test
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] [ ejb/TestBean ] is prefixed with recommended string "ejb/" within application client [ appclient_dep_compat_client ]

test.test-assertion: Application-client jar file contains the XML-based deployment descriptor test
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] Found deployment descriptor xml file [ META-INF/application-client.xml ]

test.test-assertion: The AppClient has a loadable JAAS CallbackHandler
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] AppClient callback handler is not specified.

test.test-assertion: The AppClient has a non-blank a display-name
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] AppClient display name is : [ appclient_dep_compat_client ]

test.test-assertion: The Application-client resource-type element specifies the Java class type of the data source test
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] There are no resource-type elements within the application client [ appclient_dep_compat_client ]

test.test-assertion: Application client environment entry value type test
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] There are no environment entry elements defined within this application client [ appclient_dep_compat_client ]

test.test-assertion: Application client environment entry value must be a string that is valid for the constructor of the specified type that takes a single String parameter test
test.test-description: For [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] There are no environment entry elements defined within this application client [ appclient_dep_compat_client ]

test.test-assertion: The Application provider must assign a display name to each Application
test.test-description: Application display name is : [ appclient_dep_compat ]

test.test-assertion: Application's listed J2EE Application Client modules exist in the Enterprise archive test
test.test-description: J2EE Application Client module [ appclient_dep_compat_client.jar ] exists within [ appclient_dep_compat ].

test.test-assertion: The "java" element specifies the URI of a java application client module, relative to the top level of the application package test
test.test-description: [ appclient_dep_compat_client ] specifies the URI [ appclient_dep_compat_client.jar ] of a java application client module, relative to the top level of the application package [ appclient_dep_compat ]

test.test-assertion: Application deployment descriptor must be named META-INF/application.xml
test.test-description: Found deployment descriptor xml file [ META-INF/application.xml ]

test.test-assertion: Application's listed J2EE EJB modules exist in the Enterprise archive test
test.test-description: J2EE EJB module [ appclient_dep_compat_ejb.jar ] exists within [ appclient_dep_compat ].

test.test-assertion: The "ejb" element specifies the URI of a ejb-jar, relative to the top level of the application package test
test.test-description: [ Ejb1 ] specifies the URI [ appclient_dep_compat_ejb.jar ] of an ejb-jar, relative to the top level of the application package [ appclient_dep_compat ]

test.test-assertion: The application deployment descriptor has an expected PubidLiteral.
test.test-description: The deployment descriptor has the proper PubidLiteral: -//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD J2EE Application 1.3//EN The deployment descriptor has the proper URL corresponding the the PubIdLiteral: http://java.sun.com/dtd/application_1_3.dtd

test.test-assertion: The Application may assign alternate application client deployment descriptor URI file test
test.test-description: There is no java application client alternative deployment descriptor in [ appclient_dep_compat_client ]

test.test-assertion: Application security roles names test
test.test-description: There are no security role-name elements within this application [ appclient_dep_compat ]

test.test-assertion: The Application may assign alternate web deployment descriptor URI file test
test.test-description: There are no web components in application [ appclient_dep_compat ]

test.test-assertion: The "web-uri" element specifies the URI of a web application file, relative to the top level of the application package test
test.test-description: There are no web components in application [ appclient_dep_compat ]

test.test-assertion: Application's listed J2EE Web modules exist in the Enterprise archive test
test.test-description: There are no Web components in application [ appclient_dep_compat ]

test.test-assertion: The Application may assign EJB alternate deployment descriptor URI file test
test.test-description: There is no java EJB alternative deployment descriptor in [ Ejb1 ]

test.test-assertion: All web modules in the application have a non-blank context-root test
test.test-description: There are no web components in application [ appclient_dep_compat ]
